name: andy-eso
description: Andy is an Elder Scrolls Online addon that helps protect the community by identifying malicious, stolen, paywalled, or ToS/EULA-violating addons. It monitors your installed addons and alerts you if any match our watchlist of flagged content.

scripts.dev-copy: xcopy "." "%USERPROFILE%\OneDrive\Documents\Elder Scrolls Online\live\Addons\Andy" /s /i /y /exclude:.deploy-exclude && echo Copied to live Addons folder.
